welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chaozhou, a city known for its rich cultural heritage, beautiful architecture, and delicious traditional cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy the charm of our city during your visit.

restaurants.name: NEW DAY FOOD (牛大福 - 牛肉場料理專門店/沙茶火鍋城)
restaurants.description: NEW DAY FOOD (牛大福 - 牛肉場料理專門店/沙茶火鍋城) is a taiwanese restaurant located in 潮州鎮.
